# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7570-102">Ispis e-pošte i kalendara u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7570-103">Da biste ispisali poruku e-pošte, učinite sljedeće:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="a7570-104">Odaberite poruku koju želite ispisati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a7570-105">U gornjem desnom kutu poruke odaberite tri točkice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a7570-106">a zatim odaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a7570-107">**Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7570-108">Da biste ispisali kalendar, učinite sljedeće:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a7570-109">U gornjem desnom kutu stranice odaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a7570-110">**Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a7570-111">Odaberite prikaz i vremenski raspon, a zatim odaberite **Ispiši**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7570-112">Saznajte više o tome kako [ispisati e-poštu i kalendare na servisu Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7570-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
